post_title: Looking for T206 Nap Lajoie, portrait - centered
post_content:
** looking to buy T206 Nap Lajoie Portrait **

I’ve been on a good run lately adding some all-time cards to my PC - and now, I’m looking to pick up an all time great that I’ve been thinking about for quite awhile.

I’d love to add a nicely centered T206 Napoleon Lajoie, grade 2-4 with nice eye appeal.

Please see below for illustration - thx!

Jeff
